name: Chess Match 3
description:
Match 3 Chess - Move the pieces following the rules of chess, but with the goal of getting 3 of the same color in a row (horizontally or vertically)

Pieces can freely jump over other pieces. Pawns can capture in any diagonal direction. Pieces can only move by capturing, they can't move into empty space.

You don't have to make a match with each move, but you never get more pieces so unnecessary moves reduce your potential score.
